## Events.Selected.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Selected` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_oldElementId?: string | null, opt_newElementId?: string | null, opt_workspaceId?: string);
```

</th><th>

opt\_oldElementId


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The ID of the previously selected element. Null if no element last selected. Undefined for a blank event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_newElementId


</td><td>

string \| null


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The ID of the selected element. Null if no element currently selected (deselect). Undefined for a blank event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_workspaceId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The workspace identifier for this event. Null if no element previously selected. Undefined for a blank event.


</td></tr>
